ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule on Check Batch object where If Status = Printed, then the value cannot be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c),"Printed"), ISCHANGED(Status__c), NOT(Void_Request__c), OR( NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ), NOT($Permission.DLSE_Sr_Cashier) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once status has been changed to printed the value of this field cannot be changed.
